events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with their resume and cover letter attached.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and developer.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess their experience and fit for the software engineer role.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, confirming their availability for the next stages of the interview process.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate their problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and algorithm design.
The HR interview has been scheduled with the candidate to discuss company culture, benefits, and other HR-related topics.
The HR interview was successfully completed, with the candidate expressing excitement about joining the company.
A formal job offer was proposed to the candidate, including details about compensation, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the job offer and requested clarification on some benefits details.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and expressed eagerness to start working as part of the engineering team.
The onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and access setup for the new software engineer.
The recruitment process for the software engineer position has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
